name: WordPress Scheduled Time
author: Paul Willen

sections.description:
When you’re having a large blog and post mulitple blogposts per day with multiple authors it can be very interesting to see the actual time a post is scheduled.
Standard WordPress behaviour is that you only see the scheduled date when a post is scheduled.
This plugin’s main feature is that is displays also the WordPress Scheduled Post TIME.

Other features:

  • Sorable Column on Post Status
  • Gives a clear overview if a post is published / scheduled / draft / pending review or Trashed with different colors.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the directory ‘wordpress-scheduled-time’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

OR

Install the plugin via the WordPress Plugin Repository
sections.faq:
Q: Where can I get more information about this plugin?

A: http://www.willen.net/wordpress-scheduled-time

Q: Why did you build this plugin?

A: Because it really nerved me that I couldn’t see WHEN a post was scheduled for publishing. With this plugin you can!
sections.changelog:

  • Small Bugfix

1.0.1

  • Changed Plugin description to mention the 4.1 Compatibility

1.0

  • Plugin is WordPress 4.1 Compatible

0.9

  • Initial Release

short_description: This plugin displays not only the scheduled Data, but also the scheduled Time of a WordPress Post.
